repairedDockerfile:
FROM thecodingmachine/php:7.2-v2-fpm

LABEL authors="Julien Neuhart <j.neuhart@thecodingmachine.com>, David NÃ©grier <d.negrier@thecodingmachine.com>"

USER root

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends gnupg && \
    curl -f -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_12.x | bash - && \
    apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends nodejs && \
    curl -f -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add - && \
    echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list && \
    apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends yarn && \
    npm install -g npm && npm cache clean --force; && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

USER docker
